mapper.select: select id, name, telcode, department, regioncode, address, postcode FROM customerinfo;
select id, name, telcode, department, regioncode, address, postcode FROM customerinfo where name=#{name};
select id, name, telcode, department, regioncode, address, postcode FROM customerinfo where TelCode=#{TelCode};
mapper.insert: insert into customerinfo(name, telcode, department, regioncode, address, postcode) values(#{name},#{telCode},#{Department},#{RegionCode},#{Address},#{PostCode});
